distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for curl fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-5436: Fixed a heap buffer overflow exists in tftp_receive_packet that receives data from a TFTP server (bsc#1135170).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A heap buffer overflow in the TFTP receiving code allows for DoS or arbitrary code execution in libcurl versions 7.19.4 through 7.64.1.
notes.title: CVE description
